mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, TO_CHAR(ness_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ness_date, type, content, status FROM lateness WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lateness ( employee_id, ness_date, type, content, status ) VALUES ( #{employee_id}, #{ness_date}, #{type}, #{content}, #{status} )
